Question.Subject: Looking for new Websites about Space?
Question.Content: Can you lead me to sites about space, like maybe telescopes or satilites or Space shuttle veiws and cool stuff like that ?? Thanks in advance
Question.ChosenAnswer:
If you haven't yet visited NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day (APOD) site, give it a try. http://apod.nasa.gov/apod/
There is a new picture every day and you could spend days viewing the archives. One of my favorites from APOD is: http://antwrp.gsfc.nasa.gov/apod/ap001127.html
Enjoy!
